apologies.render
================

.. py:module:: apologies.render

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Render a game as a string.





Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: render_board(game: apologies.game.Game) -> str

   Render the state of a game, returning the board for display.

   :param game: The game to render
   :type game: Game

   :returns: The board as a string, to be printed or for display on a terminal
   :rtype: str
